name: Aorta
desc:
Is the Abdominal Aorta > 3 cm?
Are the Iliac Arteries > 1.5 cm in diameter?
Is there an aortic dissection?

name: Cardiac
desc:
What is the global function/contractility?
Is there cardiac activity?
Is there pericardial effusion?
Are there signs of RV strain?

name: DVT
desc:
Does the Common Femoral Vein fully compress?
Does the Popliteal vein fully compress?

name: eFAST
desc:
Is there free fluid in the abdomen?
Is there fluid/blood in the pericardium?
Is there blood in the thorax?
Is there pneumothorax?

name: Gallbladder
desc:
Are there Gallstones?
Is there a Murphie's sign?
Is there thickening of the CBD or anterior wall?
Is there pericholecystic fluid?

name: HIMAP
desc:
Is the patient in shock?
Is there evidence of pulmonary embolism or pneumonia?
Are there signs of MI or cardiac tamponade?

name: IVC
desc:
Is the IVC < 1.5 cm or > 2.5 cm?
 Does the IVC collapse >50% with respiration?

name: OBGYN 2nd/3rd
desc: Is there a viable intrauterine pregnancy?

name: Ocular
desc:
Is the Optic Nerve Sheath > 5 mm?
Is there other ocular pathology?

name: Renal
desc:
Is there hydronephrosis?
Is the bladder distended?

name: Soft Tissue/MSK
desc:
Is there fluid collection? Signs of fasciitis or foreign body?
Is there an interruption in bony cortex?
Can the degree of angulation or displacement be assessed?
Is there tendon injury?

name: Thoracic
desc:
Are A-lines present?
Are B-lines present?
